metadata.title: CVE-2021-36095 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Malicious attacker is able to find out valid user logins by using the "lost password" feature. This issue affects: OTRS AG ((OTRS)) Community Edition version 6.0.1 and later versions. OTRS AG OTRS 7.0.x version 7.0.28 and prior versions.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
